faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our plans and services.

items.faq1Question: Is a subscription required to use ShipGlobal?
items.faq1Answer: No, our basic plan is completely free. You can use our services at no additional cost, but paid plans offer exclusive benefits and significant discounts.
items.faq2Question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
items.faq2Answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no additional fees. Access to benefits will continue until the end of the paid period.
items.faq3Answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Pix, and bank slips for payments in Brazil. For other countries, we accept international cards and PayPal.
items.faq4Question: How does the shipping discount work?
items.faq4Answer: Discounts are automatically applied at checkout when you’re logged into your account with an active subscription. The discount is calculated on the total shipping cost.
items.faq5Question: Can I change my plan after subscribing?
items.faq5Answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, with proportional adjustments to the cost.

cta.title: Start your global journey today!
cta.description: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have already unlocked the power of international shopping with ShipGlobal.
